1.1.0.en: Initial release, now compatible with the new Homey Pro 2023

1.1.1.en: Revised images, fixed some discovery issues

1.1.2.en: Fixed issue where values were not updating on the old Homey Pro

1.1.3.en: Fixed a bug, where could not discover new devices on the old Homey Pro

1.2.0.en: Added ZigBee drivers provided by Robert Klep

1.2.1.en: New developer, disabled Zigbee debug, battery level fixes, improved logging, added Zigbee product ID LYWSD03MMC-z

1.2.2.en: New developer, disabled Zigbee debug, battery level fixes, improved logging, added Zigbee product ID LYWSD03MMC-z
